snippet: While in the hospital for a kidney infection, Tolentino Gonzalez discovered he did not have insurance through his union despite working 75 hours every two weeks.
abstract: Catholic Charities and Catholic Foundation for Brooklyn and Queens help Tolentino Gonzalez of Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, who suffers from depression, pay his rent.
lead_paragraph: While in the hospital for a kidney infection, Tolentino Gonzalez discovered he did not have insurance through his union despite working 75 hours every two weeks.

headline.print_headline: Denied Insurance, Then Facing a Spiral of Depression
headline.seo: Denied Insurance, Then Facing a Spiral of Depression
headline.main: Denied Insurance, Then Facing a Spiral of Depression
